Title: Calendar Control in WPF
Description: WPF Calendar Control is a calendar control to be used inside your WPF Applications. Since the code provided by the toolkit and the other controls are tooo techy, I have created a very simplified version. Please enjoy.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF Calendar Control is a calendar control to be used inside your WPF Applications. Since the code provided by the toolkit and the other controls are tooo techy, I have created a very simplified version. Please enjoy.

The WPF Calendar Control is ready to use Calendar Control to be used in WPF Applications. I have used a very very simple version of Xaml and binding so that people can understand the logic as well. I have not put various changes like routed events etc, which you normally find in a WPF control developed by the pundits. But I am not an expert. Just want to share the project so that novice people like me don't have to search the web and spend number of hours just to find a calendar control and understand the code behind it.

Thanks,
Vikas
Please visit my Blog
